TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DragEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 、 或 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , or event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户通过将对象拖到控件上并通过释放鼠标按钮将其放到控件上完成拖放操作时，将发生 事件。The event occurs when the user completes a drag-and-drop operation by dragging an object over the control and then dropping it onto the control by releasing the mouse button. 当用户将鼠标指针移到控件上并使用鼠标拖动对象时，将发生 事件。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer onto the control while dragging an object with the mouse. 当用户将鼠标指针移到控件上并使用鼠标拖动对象时，会发生 事件。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the control while dragging an object with the mouse. 对象指定与此事件关联的任何数据;SHIFT、CTRL 和 ALT 键的当前状态;鼠标指针的位置;拖动事件的源和目标所允许的拖放效果。A object specifies any data associated with this event; the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys; the location of the mouse pointer; and the drag-and-drop effects allowed by the source and target of the drag event. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)] 下面的示例演示如何在拖放操作的源和目标之间传递 。The following example illustrates how are passed between the source and target of a drag-and-drop operation. 在此示例中， 控件是数据源，而 控件是目标。In this example, a control is the source of the data, and the control is the target. 该示例假设已使用有效文件名的列表填充了 控件。The example assumes that the control has been populated with a list of valid filenames. 当用户将其中一个显示的文件名从 控件拖动到 控件上时，将打开文件名中引用的文件。When the user drags one of the displayed filenames from the control onto the control, the file referenced in the filename is opened. 在 控件的 MouseDown 事件中启动操作。The operation is initiated in the control's MouseDown event. 在 事件处理程序中，该示例使用 方法来验证数据是否采用 控件可以显示的格式，然后设置 属性以指定应将数据从源控件复制到目标控件。In the event handler, the example uses the method to verify that the data is in a format that the control can display and then sets the property to specify that data should be copied from the source control to the target control. 最后， 控件的 System.windows.dragdrop.drop> 事件处理程序使用 方法检索要打开的文件名。Finally, the control's DragDrop event handler uses the method to retrieve the filename to open. [!code-cpp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取拖动事件的发起方（或源）所允许的拖放操作。

span.span: Gets which drag-and-drop operations are allowed by the originator (or source) of the drag event.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件通过调用 方法启动拖放操作时，它指定操作的允许效果。When a control initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the method, it specifies the permissible effects of the operation. 例如，当您从源拖动某个文件时，如果该文件是只读的（或从只读存储介质（如 CD），则源会指示该文件可以复制但不会传输到目标。For example, when you drag a file from a source, if the file is read-only (or from a read-only storage medium such as a CD), the source will indicate that the file can be copied, but not transferred, to the target. 尝试对拖动的数据执行操作之前，应检查此属性以确保允许该操作。Before attempting to perform an operation on the dragged data, you should examine this property to ensure that the operation is allowed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件处理程序的正文中，可以使用 方法来确定数据是否与要将数据拖动到的控件的格式要求相匹配。In the body of your event handler, you can use the method to determine whether the data matches the format requirements of the control onto which the data is being dragged. 还可以指定是否想要尝试转换数据以满足格式要求。You also can specify whether you want to attempt to convert the data to meet your format requirements. 如果拖动的数据满足格式要求，请使用 方法检索数据。If the dragged data meets your format requirements, use the method to retrieve the data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置拖放操作中目标放置效果。

span.span: Gets or sets the target drop effect in a drag-and-drop operation.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，应用的效果将决定拖放操作目标的鼠标光标。By default, the effect applied determines the mouse cursor for the target of a drag-and-drop operation. 这对于向用户提供有关将发生的操作的反馈非常有用。This is useful to provide feedback to the user on the operation that will occur. 例如，如果在从源拖动文件时按下 CTRL 键，则指定 以指示目标将尝试执行复制操作。For example, if you press the CTRL key when you drag a file from a source, specify to indicate the target will try to perform a copy operation. 若要将自定义游标用于拖动操作，请参阅 。To use custom cursors for a drag operation, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyState As Integer
public: property int KeyState { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取 Shift、Ctrl 和 Alt 键的当前状态以及鼠标按钮的状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons.

value.span: Shift、Ctrl、Alt 键以及鼠标按钮的当前状态。

span.span: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys and of the mouse buttons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使拖放操作的效果依赖于特定键的状态。You can make the effect of a drag-and-drop operation to depend on the state of a particular key. 例如，你可以根据在拖放操作期间是否按下 CTRL 或 SHIFT 键来决定复制或移动数据。For example, you may decide to copy or move data depending on whether the CTRL or SHIFT keys are pressed during the drag-and-drop operation. 在 属性中设置的位标识在操作过程中按下的键或鼠标按钮。The bits that are set in the property identify the keys or mouse buttons that were pressed during the operation. 例如，如果按下鼠标左键，则会设置 属性中的第一位。For example, if the left mouse button is pressed, the first bit in the property is set. 可以使用按位 "与" 运算符来测试给定的键状态。You can use the bitwise AND operator to test for a given key state. 下表列出了用于指定事件的值。The following table lists the values that are used for a specified event. |值Value|KeyKey| |-----------|---------| |1（位0）1 (bit 0)|鼠标左按钮。The left mouse button.| |2（位1）2 (bit 1)|鼠标右按钮。The right mouse button.| |4（bit 2）4 (bit 2)|Shift 键。The SHIFT key.| |8（bit 3）8 (bit 3)|CTRL 键。The CTRL key.| |16（bit 4）16 (bit 4)|鼠标中键。The middle mouse button.| |32（bit 5）32 (bit 5)|Alt 键。The ALT key.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property X As Integer
public: property int X { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取鼠标指针在屏幕坐标系中的 x 坐标。

span.span: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse pointer, in screen coordinates.

value.span: 鼠标指针的 X 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取鼠标指针在屏幕坐标系中的 y 坐标。

span.span: Gets the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer, in screen coordinates.

value.span: 鼠标指针的 Y 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer in pixels.
